replies.body: Just bring back Crystal Scar already, I miss Hide and Seek :(
Upvote this 1 million times
Sure, why not. Something else to chill outside of ranked.
Did Riot seriously just try to copy Autochess from Dota 2...

I mean they literally answered your question in the post if you bothered to read it properly.

> We’ve always loved strategy games and recently we’ve gotten into the new auto-battler genre—folks around the office have been playing an insane amount of Dota Auto Chess in particular. We love it, and it actually got us inspired to create something new as a mode in League.

Also, Dota Auto Chess was a custom map IN Dota 2 IIRC. I don't think it was by Valve themselves, so it's not really "from" Dota? 

That's like getting mad that Dota copied Dota from Warcraft 3, or that Fortnite / PUBG copied their games from ARMA.
Thanks it was a rhetorical question fyi I can read
Hang on this isn't Black Market Brawlers...

I like it. just take time to fully integrate it into the game, lore etc. I'm not sure if riot take advice? but if you want any hope for the numbers, use the pros for launch !! lets say, a tournament on release hosted by all the league partners, to determine rank 1 etc by the end of the event, could be cool seeing how league hasn't had the opportunity to "launch" a permanent mode before (rip dominion)
great innovative idea
Why make it all cost money? can some of it atleast be earnable because it just makes it a cashgrab
It's completely free to play though? It's still only purely cosmetic items that cost money.
When will the mobile version be released?
Good stuff!
Can't wait to try it
Good stuff rito!
I love Rito!
Great but where's One for All and all the other enjoyable RGM. I had hoped there was a more frequent cycle in the rotations but ...
autochess 2

Alot of us who used to play competitive left the game in the early days of getting OCE, around season 3-4. Myself along with more than a few others would return to this game if its fun and something along the lines of a polished actual dev worked on version of autochess. 

Fingers crossed it lives up to our expectations, and good idea jumping on board. Alot of us don't want to grind hours everyday, every week just to keep up on an everchanging meta and keeping our micro/macro skills up to standard.

So eh lets see what happens, very very keen to try this out and stream it
I love this :o I really wonder though what they're going to do for rewards etc. and if there will be a separate section on your profile showcasing TFT wins and stats.
Pimp alternative to the general game modes we're used to.
optimal team is teemos and MORE TEEMOS {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Knowing Riot this is gonna be better than Autochess!
nice
league autochess,lol,{{summoner:6}}
it took 10 years to make other game n they just copy dota auto chess at least we call them riot games now
how about fix summoners rift and all the champion bugs before making new game mode you absolute monkeys.

Instead of creating some random new mode that doesn't fit LoL at all, how about expanding or improving existing things instead. The community has been **begging** for more creative control for custom games such as having a settings option where you can adjust everything in the match such as having max gold, increase walk speed, remove cooldowns etc etc 

**How about bringing the Crystal Scar back??** That map was just abandoned because Summoners Rift got all the attention instead. Yet another case of the League community begging for something and been ignored. Everyday there was constantly lobbies of people playing hide and seek and ive never had as much fun on this game then i did playing hide and seek (i also meet a lot of friends there) 

Sad how a "pretend" game mode was more fun then the actual game but can you blame us? Summoners Rift drags on for way too long and the match making is terrible (another feature that could be improved). i see countless people (including myself) wanting URF mode to be around forever so we have more options other then Normals/Ranked or Aram  

But no... lets have Teamfight Tactics instead. Be dammed what the players want :)

Rotating Game Mode was great.. well, except when the same gamemode was chosen half of the time. Riot just replaces or abandons all the good old things that made League, or the modes that complemented and gave it more variety. I'm just losing interest these days.. They still only use two maps 95% of the time, when League is one of the most popular games around. Speaking of which, 1 hour pauses at msi small indie company
Spot on

Riot, I’m not so sure this game belongs as it’s own “game mode” as it does it’s own “game” - this doesn’t really fit league in any real way aside from lore and as such I don’t get how this is a game mode... However as it’s own game I’m not convinced on this strategy, though I guess we’ll see how much depth it has.
